location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Kaye, Accountant General, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter concerns the pension of the late Aga Mahomed Bebhany (also written elsewhere in the volume as Bebany, Babony and Bebanee). Includes a copy of a letter, dated 8 October 1811, from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to John Kaye, Accountant General, Bombay, which has its own enclosure: an extract from a letter, dated 8 October 1811, from the Secretary to the Government to the Military Paymaster General.
